A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There were so many epic parts of this movie and I left speechless.  My wife and I didn't even know what to say.  Rey is incredible as well as Kylo.  The entire movie was very emotional: funny\, sad\, tense\, excited\, etc.  
Spoilers ahead****


One thing that I loved\, is they showed how sometimes missions fail and not everything always works out the way that you want.  I thought that they answered a lot of questions\, but left a lot to look forward to for the next one.

The only thing that I didn't like was the unexplained way that Leia survived being in space and wooshing her way back to the ship.  Other than that part\, I loved every single second of it.
